article.Heading: Jaitley serves notice to table Aadhar Bill in Lok Sabha
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley intends to push it as a Money Bill
article.Body:
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has already served a notice to table the Aadhar Bill in the Lok Sabha. He intends to push it as a Money Bill. This is in order to give the platform a statutory backing, a move that will expand its range of utility in providing government benefits.

Watch video for more...
